commit message: Set vibration pattern (default does not always work)
New setting: Play (notification) sound on highlight
Run all scenario tests and cleanup after each test
Ident: Add '-' to the list of allowed characters
Fix voice recognition: Only add top match to the text input (and code cleanup)
Added italian translation (Thanks to Gianmarco Laggia!)
'Add' layouts: Use minimum width for small buttons
PircBot Patch: Recognize '%' as a nickname prefix
New user action view and new actions: reply, query
Removed empty line from CONTRIBUTORS file
ServerListAdapter: Change server label color in list depending on connect state
PircBot Patch: Set nickname outside of connect loop. Otherwise server replies setting the nickname during connect may be overwritten (bugfix for irssi proxy)
PircBot Patch: Parse nicknames without host part (bugfix for irssi proxy)
Target and minimum SDK Version set to 4 (Android 1.6)
Add server activity: Add content description for accessibility
Reopen last opened channel/activity when app is resumed. Closes #35.
Make compatible with sBNC and other IRC bouncers. Closes #19.

Work around duplicated activities.

With activity:launchMode = standard, we get duplicated activities
depending on the task the app was started in. In order to avoid
stacking up of this duplicated activities we keep a count of this
root activity and let it finish if it already exists

Launching the app via the notification icon creates a new task,
and there doesn't seem to be a way around this so this is needed

Reduce sensitivity of the channel gallery view.

Higher scroll speeds are reduced stronger.
Tweak some nick colors to be better readable on Yaaic's dark background.

Use a different color for join/part/quit for the circles in the ConversationSwitcher view.

This makes it easier to ignore unintersting messages wihout turning off the setting to show joins/parts/quits.
Once circle is colored for a new message, the join/part/quit cannot override it anymore.
Refactor ChannelList to ConversationGallery - Moved to view package, added javadoc and licence header
Use view with new name in XML
Migrate test project to Android 1.6 too
Fix NullPointerException when using upercase characters in command names
Refactor ConversationSwitcher: onDraw() - May throw ConcurrentModificationException
Handle auto joins after the user has registered with the server.
Fix unit test MessageTest after refactoring
Hide join/part setting now hides quit messages too
New Setting: Show notices in server window. Closes #47.

channelitem.xml: Use dp for padding and sp for fonts
useritem.xml: Use dp for padding and sp for fonts
